name: Cheeky Stamp Blendable Blush
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:
ingredients: Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Methicone, Polybutene, Mica (Ci 77019), Silica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Cyclopentasiloxane, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Pentylene Glycol, Microcrystalline Wax, Dextrin Palmitate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Caprylyl Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Fragrance, Ultramarines (Ci 77007), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Red 30 (Ci 73360), Aluminum Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Twist top to reveal heart-shaped applicator. .-Pop open bottom compact. .-Press sponge into product and stamp on the apples of cheeks. .-Blend immediately with fingertips. .-Tip: Stamp once for a natural-looking flush, or twice to build to a bold color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Blush in the shade Saucy is an absolute delight! The innovative stamp design makes application a breeze, giving me the perfect flush of color effortlessly. The shade Saucy offers a lovely, natural-looking hue that complements various skin tones, imparting a fresh and radiant finish. What I adore most is its blendability. it seamlessly merges into the skin, creating a soft, dewy effect. The compact size makes it super convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. Plus, the packaging is adorable! If you're after a quick, easy, and charmingly effective blush, this one's a gem. Kaja's cheeky stamp blush has definitely become necessary in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this blendable blush! The heart stamp design is not just cute but also incredibly practical for application. The colors blend seamlessly, giving my cheeks a natural, rosy glow. The formula is silky smooth and buildable, allowing for a subtle touch or a more vibrant look, depending on the occasion. It's long-lasting and doesn't fade throughout the day, which is a big win for me. The packaging is adorable, making it a staple in my makeup routine. Overall, a fantastic blush that's as delightful as it is functional.

reviews.review_text: Recently tried Kaja's Cheeky Stamp Blush in the shade 'Saucy,' and I'm genuinely impressed! The unique stamp design not only adds a playful touch to the application process but also delivers a beautiful and natural flush. The color 'Saucy' is perfect for achieving that radiant, just-pinched look. The formula blends effortlessly, providing a buildable coverage that lasts throughout the day. Plus, the compact packaging makes it ideal for on-the-go touch-ups. Overall, Kaja's Cheeky Stamp Blush has become a new favorite in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_text: Generously gifted by Kaja in exchange for my HONEST review.  Cute little stamp! And very blendable! I'm actually impressed with this. I wanted it for the novelty of it, but I actually ended up truly liking it a lot. 10/10 would recommend.

The blush is definitely pigmented but still manageable for blending compared to some other liquid or cushion blushes I‚Äôve tried. It is also very buildable. The blush color usually stays on most of the day for me and doesn‚Äôt wear off. All in all, I love this blush and it has become a staple in my collection, especially for summer!

reviews.review_text: Gifted by KaJa. I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Cheeky Stamp Blendable Blush, and I must say, it has quickly become one of my favorite makeup products. This innovative blush offers a unique twist to the conventional blush application, making it a fun and convenient addition to my daily routine.  One of the standout features of the Cheeky Stamp Blendable Blush is its adorable stamp design. The small stamp on the cushioned applicator makes it easy to achieve a perfectly defined and precise application. It provides a level of control that I‚Äôve never experienced with traditional blush brushes or sponges. The stamp‚Äôs size is just right, allowing me to effortlessly deposit the ideal amount of product onto my cheeks without any mess or fuss.  The blendability of this blush is exceptional. Once applied, it effortlessly melts into my skin, leaving a natural and radiant flush that enhances my complexion beautifully. The formula is buildable, allowing me to create both subtle daytime looks and more dramatic evening makeup effortlessly. I appreciate that the blendable blush is available in a range of shades to suit various skin tones, ensuring everyone can find their perfect match.

reviews.review_text: I am in love with this,  the packaging it‚Äôs beautiful and the way you apply it is so creative! This blush is super cute and the heart stamp shape is actually pretty good for blending. It‚Äôs perfect for that ‚Äúno make up‚Äù make up look ‚ú®

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Beautiful and very cute!  This blush is unlike anything I've ever experienced.  It is super pigmented and just a single soft touch with the sponge gives a beautiful effect on the face!  I loved the color and how easy it spreads!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the packaging is soooo cute. It‚Äôs a bit clunky with the stamp but I don‚Äôt mind since I don‚Äôt travel with it or have to cram it into my storage organizer.  The stamp clicking is so satisfying I spent a good 20 minutes stamping it before I actually used it with the blush haha  As for the blush itself, it‚Äôs the first time I‚Äôve used a cushion blush. I personally find that I need a bit more than one stamp per cheek with this color. The blush dries down to a natural finish. While it is a bit sheer, it can easily be built up into a nice glow on the face. It does fade away by the end of the day but it‚Äôs more long lasting than I expected from a cushion blush.   Overall, I‚Äôd recommend this if you like natural looks and if you‚Äôre a sucker for cute packaging haha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The sponge applicator was super cute and I liked when applying the blush to the sponge, it didn't suck up all the product. It was super easy to blend and once blended out, it looked really dewy and natural on my skin. Building it up was no problem and its best to tap on your face with the sponge rather than swiping for the best results.

I love the concept of this blush! The heart sponge application is such a cute and creative idea, and makes applying blush so fun and easy. It is easy to build and blend out. Plus, the color of this blush is beautiful and adds a great look. Overall, a very nice product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: So in love with this blush !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

The blush goes on pretty sheer and I found myself needing quite a few dabs of product.  It is very simple to blend which makes it look natural. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this better than I expected! The packaging reminds me of my childhood stamps and inkpads and it's basically the color cosmetics world's reply to cushion foundation. The formula of the blush is light in consistency and provides a great middle ground between too pigmented (read: easy to be heavy handed) and too light. One small tap gives a nice natural glow, which looks awesome over my tinted moisturizer or (gasp) bare face after using skincare. This can be used on barely-there makeup days and built up for a full face. Just make sure you're not using a powder before applying this on the cheeks! We don't want any pilling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute, pretty color but it doesn‚Äôt blend at all or well. It comes out looking patchy and lifts my base make up. I feel like the shimmer used for this blush are also a bit to chunky. I‚Äôve tried making it work but overall I really dislike it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is beautiful, however, here is some advices to use it :  First, be sure to sleep well the night before. You'll need to be rested. Drink a glass of water beforehand to be hydrated. Apply your primer, foundation and concealer as usual. DON'T POWDER YOUR FACE YET!!!  Now you're ready to apply your blush. DON'T USE THE STAMP! I know it's cute and you want to, but don't. It's a trap. The blush will dry too fast and you will be stuck with weird spots on your face. You don't want that.   Use your finger and gently press the cushion. Now, gently tap your fingers where you want to apply the blush. DON'T RUB IT! You'll ruin your base. You can layer it as much as you want. It really blends well with fingers. I didn't have much success with brushes/sponges.  Now that you've finished your blush application, you're free to continue your makeup as you wish. You can put powder on top of it, but is has a really beautiful finish when left by itself. It lasts a very decent amount of time too.

reviews.review_title: Definitely Cute But Could Last Longer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Marc Jacobs‚Äô Enamored line of lip gloss sti These stamp blushers are definitely cute and come in pretty colors, however the packaging is a bit bulky for travel and the shade that I got (01 Coy) didn't last that long (I stamped my cheeks twice on each side as instructed). I guess it's fine if I'm just using it for a night out, but I wouldn't be able to apply it in the morning and expect it to still be there by the end of the day. However I'm open to trying a different shade to see if that helps. Sad because the 01 Coy shade is actually pretty natural enough to wear to work.  For reference I'm a light-medium shade, but it seems the darker your skin is, the more difficult it is to get this product to show up. Also, while I didn't have any issues blending this, some people do. If you're not a big fan of liquid blush or previously had a bad experience, this is probably not going to change your mind. However if you've never tried liquid blush before or just open to this particular brand/product, I think it's worth a try (you might be one of the ones that actually like it).  I received this product as a free sample through Influenster.

reviews.review_text: The KAJA stamp has a great color, but it's not very strong when you apply it. It takes multiple applications before you even see any color. I'm a medium skin tone, so this may be why. I'd image this product may fair better with a fair skin tone, but if you have a warmer tone, like me, this may not work for you. The other issue is that the stamp either picks up too much or too little product. Half the time you waste the product, because it hardens over night on the stamp and isn't usable. The shape of it is nice for the cheeks, but all in all it just didn't work as expected and is quite wasteful for the price.

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Blush For a Natural Summer Glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The KAJA blush has become my new favorite. First of all, it is the cutest blush I‚Äôve ever seen. It has a heart stamp applicator (so fun!) and it comes in four different shades. I got the 01 Coy-dusty rose shade and it gives my cheeks a light-rosy natural glow. For a bolder look I stamp my cheeks more than once until I achieve the intensity I want.  This blush is exactly what I was looking for to get that summer glow! The blush itself has a creamy texture that is easy to blend with my fingertips or a brush. Another highlight of this creamy blush is that it didn‚Äôt cracked when I accidentally droped it. In other words, is mess-free!  But what makes KAJA so especial is its compact packaging that is secure and easy  to carry around.   ** I received this product complimentary for testing purposes, but all the opinions are mine**

reviews.review_text: I received the color dusty rose and I absolutely love it! Out of all the shades, I would love to try out the dusty mauve color but they are all gorgeous. The formula is very easy to apply and blend with my fingertips. Some suggest to try blending with a beauty blender rather than the heart shape sponge it comes with. The heart shaped sponge applicator, although it‚Äôs incredibly cute, could be a bit softer. But with the packaging as adorable as it is, it‚Äôs hard to find anything negative about this product. I can‚Äôt wait to try more from this K-Beuaty brand! I received this item complimentary for testing purposes, but all my opinions are my own.

reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blush! first of all the packaging is too die for (except not the best for traveling since it's pretty chunky) and the heart applicator makes it so easy to apply. I wasn't quite sure how I would feel about it being more of a liquid/cream blush but I honestly prefer it over powder. It gives me such a beautiful and natural finish. I also love how quick and easy it is to apply, all I need it a tap of this and I just use my fingers to blend! I also loooove the color of this blush, like I sound like I'm exaggerating but it is honestly such a beautiful color on my skin tone. I have deep dark skin and was worried that it wouldn't show up/ would appear ashy but nope just a beautiful pinky color. The one slight downfall is that it is shimmery and I prefer blush without shimmer in it but due to this I just use a light hand when applying highlighter so it balances out. All in all, so in love with this product and so happy that I received it complimentary for testing purposes. I would definitely recommend this to a friend! my sister is already asking if she can borrow it lol

The stamp for the cushion gives it character which makes it super cute and super fun to play with.   I received this blush in the color Coy. After trying it on for the first time today, I love how the color is very natural and light. It blends very well and you can build up if the color isn't pigmented enough to your liking. A little bit of this product goes a long way. I've worn the color all day now and the color has yet to fade. I just absolutely love everything from the stamping concept, the cushion to the color. I will definitely be buying more of this once I'm out and trying the other colors to see which to add to my vanity.

I seriously haven‚Äôt been this impressed with a brand overall in quite sometime. I like everything I tried, but these are my favorite. If you haven‚Äôt tried these out, I HIGHLY recommend doing so. You are truly missing out. I love how they‚Äôve taken mainstream products and made them super unique. The packaging is great. The heart stamp is cute but it actually adds the perfect amount and blends the product beautifully. Although I probably will use my beauty blender from time to time, this is great for people that don‚Äôt have a sponge because it‚Äôs an all in one. The prices are right and well worth what you get. I love the shade I tried, 02 Saucy, & I‚Äôve already purchased shades 01 & 03 because I love them that much. Kaja PLEASE release more shades, these are amazing and a stand out product in my book for sure!

reviews.review_text: So, I love this product, first off! I thought this product would melt right off my oily skin, but I was wrong. The shade I received was 02 (saucy) and is the most gorgeous, glow from within pink shade ever. It wears well all day, is super easy to apply (I use a stippling brush to apply, only because I can‚Äôt make myself ruin/use the cute heart sponge it comes with, lol). I have not used many blushes other than powder, so I‚Äôm not sure how it would compare to other brands, but I know that I am now a fan of this type of blush and application and would repurchase in a heartbeat! The only reason I give this 4 stars is because I noticed it definitely pulls off some of my face product when I use a powder foundation. I haven‚Äôt noticed it as much with liquid foundations, but because I love the way it looks and the formulation, that is fine by me!

reviews.review_text: I'm an actress, so blush a is must for me. Powders are great, but can fade and cause issues on costumes. This stamp is a great solution! The stamp is just that, a stamp that you press into the pad in the bottom of the case and then just press to your cheeks and smudge with a finger or a brush. The result is a pretty pink tint. There is a slight sparkle in the 'ink' which may not be for everyone. Also I can see the compartment with the applicator getting ink all over the inside if you don't clean the brush after each use (hack: drop a tiny bit of a tissue in the bottom to avoid this!).   It's cute compact and seems to wear very well. It's a nice strong pigment so perfect for stage lights. I'd give it a try!  I received this product in return for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôll start this review off by saying: I never wear blush and I received this product complimentary from Influensters for the purpose of reviewing. (color: 02 Saucy).  Now with that said, this was my favorite product I received in my VoxBox! My makeup style is more natural and that is why I tend not reach for a variety of products. Since receiving this Kaja blush stamp, I‚Äôve reached for it daily. It is a cream/liquid blush which could be why I‚Äôm a fan. I‚Äôve been a huge fan of liquid bronzer and highlighter lately because to me the texture provides a more dewy, natural look vs. ‚Äúcakey.‚Äù Anyway, the application is fun and easy. It‚Äôs a heart shaped stamp that you dip in the product and stamp onto your cheek bones. It says to use one stamp for a more natural look and two stamps worth of product for a heavier look. I used one stamp then blend with my fingers. It blends so easily and I‚Äôm left with the perfect wintery rosy cheeks. Something I usually stay away from because I have rosacea but I currently have it under control and can just enjoy the pretty rosiness! It‚Äôs been lasting through my entire 12 hour shifts so I can vouch for its staying power. I‚Äôm typically more of a bronzer person to add some color to my pale skin but I honestly think this product may have converted me to cream blush .. for the winter season, atleast :)   I received this product in color 02 Saucy which provided a natural look for my fair colored skin. I‚Äôll include a photo for reference! Though I received this product for free, the above thoughts are my own based on my personal experience using this product.

Either way it is super easy to blend out and is such a perfect amount of blush! I highly recommend this product to anyone. You can use a little or use a lot, either way it will look stunning!

Once it dries down it it turns into a powder that sheds in patches revealing stained skin.   I get what they were going for but this is not the way to do it. Would return it if I could. Sad cause this brand looked really interesting but unfortunately it just seems to be about the packaging and I wish it could be a quality product too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cushion blush. The shape and size of the stamp help me correctly apply to my cheek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour is super soft and natural! It gives a pretty flushed look and has a natural creamy finish, great for my dry skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Agree with the earlier comment regarding dark skin. Thought this product would be fun, but it does not show up on my skin. Might be a good plaything for little girls practicing, but not for me. Not impressed with this purchase. They should keep working on a formula that works for dark complexions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Can be used for a subtle look or a more intense one with building and is so cute and fun to apply

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not worth the plastic waste! the product is nice, and I get the cute factor, but there's gotta be a way to do cute without all the trash. maybe loading the product into the heart stamp to avoid the extra plastic to house the cushion? over all the blush itself was a pretty color and it was a nice formula, but not necessarily game changing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm always anti cushion products but still bought this one just for fun. It‚Äôs fun to use, but not really that easy to blend. I only used it 2-3 times. However, I was still ok with it, until I saw MOLD grow in it. :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it in theory, but just don‚Äôt understand why the packaging needs to be this bulky. Not convenient for storage or travel. I‚Äôd opt for another similar product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for this. The color is beautiful and is perfect for a natural flush. Unfortunately, they ruined it by filling it with glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color, and this formula blends so well! I use the stamp to apply it and then blend with my fingers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product kind of on a whim since I wasn't in need of a new blush. But when I saw it featured in an email from Sephora I knew I had to try it out. The color is subtle (maybe a little lighter than I expected) but it leaves a lovely flush of color to my cheeks. I was a little hesitant about trying it since it's a cream blush and I had never used a cream blush before. But the application is so smooth and it blends out beautifully (I just use my fingers) with a powder like feeling. The packaging and application process is beyond adorable. The only real down side I can think of about it is that it's kind of bulky. That is if you had a small bag and wanted to bring it with you to go. But that's really not a big deal since the color seems to last a while on me. I'm definitely going to be buying at least one more of these in a different color. But knowing me I'll probably end up getting all four of them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color for my medium skin!  It blended so easy and it has the cutest packaging. I love this!!! I am so trying to other colors.

reviews.review_title: Stamp the Heart! Super Cute Blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Hmm.. Super cute packaging and fun product. As for the product it's fairly basic and gimmicky. I was super excited to stamp the heart but after a few stamps I went back to my regular powder blush. Worth a try for the fun of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is gorgeous and not too pink not too peachy. Love how light it is that you can build it up or leave a soft touch of color. The packaging is adorable and the sponge is a cute heart. This is one of the two first products I order from the Kaja brand and they sure didn‚Äôt disappoint!

reviews.review_title: Started Off with a BANG.....then Fizzled
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I adored this-surpassed my NARS blush-for about 3 weeks.  After that, I had to really work to get anything on the sponge.  For the price, I won‚Äôt purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: cutest packaging, natural feel, perfect for the every day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush - I had always used powder blushes in the past, and now I realise the error of my ways.  A little of this goes along way and looks like such a lovely, natural flush.  I actually don't even use the stamper because it puts a bit too much product on my face.  I just use my finger and press it into the blush and go from there.  It applies really nicely and blends really well, and I look 100x healthier after it's on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: An outstanding cream blush! Easy to appy - one stamp for each cheek is the perfect amount for a healthy glow. Easy to blend with just your fingers - a combination of lightly rubbing and tapping is all I need to blend this out. Not finicky to blend at all. Feels comfortable on my skin - not at all sticky or tacky. Stays all day. Looks natural - not streaky or splotchy, colour looks perfectly blended. Perfect colour - Coy is the perfect coral colour for a no-makeup makeup look. Fun - honestly the heart shaped stamp is just really fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do NOT get if you have dark skin. Does not show up at all. This particular color at least. I‚Äôm still waiting to try other colors

reviews.review_title: Seems weird but it is life changing!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I'll admit the heart shaped spongey thing that comes with this can be extremely off-putting BUT if don't use that and instead you pounce your beauty blender into the cushion and then apply its actually STUNNING!!! It is my first time trying a cream brush and anything from this brand but I AM IN LOVE!! TRY IT!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color's pretty but I didn't expect the glitter. Not really the look I was going for. A cute blush if that's what you want, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: That this is so cute is bonus to it works GREAT! i was looking for a cream blush for winter, I have dry skin and look to avoid as much powder as possible in the winter .. even worked over powder when i forgot to apply first. The stamp is genius as with previous cream blush I‚Äôve always applied too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was not expecting to like this but I absolutely love it. It's this super light and sheer color but it makes an impact. The packaging and cute stamp is such a great bonus. It makes me WANT to wear blush, and I usually don't. I am medium dark skin and coy is a dusty pink. I wish they had more darker-skin tone friendly options.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most unique blush ever!! I was dying to get my hands on it, and was so excited to receive this shade in my Sephoria swag bag! If you stamp it on your cheeks once it looks very subtle (perfect for those no-makeup makeup days) but since I wanted a full glam look I did it twice and blended with a beauty blender. I had already applied setting powder and it still went on perfectly fine on top of that! It has great staying power too, compared to so many of my other blushes that fade off in a couple of hours. Really impressed and would definitely recommend to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My mom and I went to the Sephoria event and got this as we left in our complimentary bags. Once I went so look at everything, I discovered this and immediately fell in love with the packaging. I tried it on the next day and was shocked at how easy it is to use and how beautifully it blended out! Seriously trading out my tarte blush for this! HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm confused, a little weirded out, but oddly satisfied.   I thought the sponge would be soft and pliable, I also thought I would be able to leave the imprint of a heart on my cheeks. Neither is the case but that's ok. This still blends out nicely, a little light but I'm fair and all works out in the end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cute cushion blush in shade 02 saucy from the Sephoria event and im falling in love with it! Super natural and easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this is a fun product, performs very well. I noticed it doesn‚Äôt take much work to get a lot of product to ‚Äústamp‚Äù your cheek. My suggestion would be start by lightly pressing the sponge stamp on the color cushion, I had plenty of product which blended out nicely. What I really like is this product did not mess up any of the powder products I already use and worked great with my setting powder. Definitely worth a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing. I‚Äôve had a hard time finding a blush that shows up well on my light skin and this gives just the right amount and a very natural flush. I have really sensitive skin and it also didn‚Äôt make me break out I‚Äôve spent a lot on expensive blushes over the years that didn‚Äôt even show up on my skin but this looks great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush comes to you in a sturdy plastic cylinder which makes it great for travel. The product is on the bottom and is a cushion type product. The applicator is on top in a secure second twist compartment. The applicator is shaped like a heart....very fun. You stamp the applicator in the product and then onto your skin. The product is blendable, light and perfect for a natural look. I used it on my eyes as well for a no makeup look. It wears well and stayed on all day. I do recommend this product but it is a bit clunky. I did detect a slight fragrance so if you are sensitive be careful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very fun and so blendable! Feel so smooth and I love the look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is pretty dry and has zero shimmer to it. Wish I never bought it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this packaging is SO cute!! I love how creative the brand is and the adorable heart sponge. The heart sponge disperses the perfect amount of product onto each cheek - as someone who always applies too much cream blush on the cheek, this is such a smart idea! The blush itself comes in a cushion format and is so easy to blend. Not only is the color payoff really great, but the product blends beautifully on top of other makeup. The blush does not have any strong scent and the shade Coy is a beautiful mauve-nude color that would work on so many skintypes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didn't like the cheap looking package and the color was a bit dry and not that blendable . Did return

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My 15 year old loves it - it is perfect for a teenager. Fun and natural...just enough color for a no makeup makeup

reviews.review_title: ordered Saucy 3 times & received Feisty 3 times
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these blushes, love love love! That Being said between me and my daughter, we ordered saucy THREE separate times and every time each of us received Fiesty so they have some issue in the shipping Dept. Either way, I kept one fiesty and then my husband went to the physical store to get me saucey (I can‚Äôt walk). Fantastic colors, love the sponge applicator, just thrilled. Very happy with both colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: im not a blush fan at all... but this is so stunning. it gives the perfect pop of colour while still looking natural, and is buildable if you want it brighter. and the packaging- wow. it‚Äôs honestly THE cutest and convenient i‚Äôve seen. i so recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is easily one of the cutest, most useful blushes I own to date! It has a heart shaped applicator that you can use to apply the product or you can use a dense brush or your fingers ( I find fingers work best). It is easy to blend out and a little goes a long way! Overall, I'm really enjoying this blush and would recommend to anyone looking to pick up a cute, pigmented blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this blush, it blends really nicely and the colour is sheer yet very pigmented. I only wish I'd realized it has sparkles as I'm not wild about that in a blush, All in all I love it and use it every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim cause I thought it was super cute and I could literally walk around with hearts on my cheeks (not like I would but still). my past experiences with liquid blush have not been good. I tried the glossier cloud paint and while the color of that is fantastic, it doesn‚Äôt wear long and it doesn‚Äôt blend out well. This stamp is the best of both worlds. It‚Äôs like if you used a traditional stamp and stamped it on paper; it comes out kinda spotty but that‚Äôs what makes it blend out so nicely. Best when applied before powder!! Such a natural and beautiful color!! I‚Äôm in love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hello, this color is perfect. I'm pretty pale (usually 2 or 3 shades up from the lightest foundation shade) and so this pigment shows up really nicely on my skin, and I have to be careful not to overdo it. One stamp on each cheekbone is perfect, then I blend it out with my fingertips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cutest blush ever? I think so. Adorable factor aside, I love how simple the application of Kaja's cheeky stamp blush is. I also like to apply it by stamping it on my fingertips and blending it out on my cheeks, I like to put it on the top of my cheeks, up by my eyes a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I find using the heart stamp distributes a bit too much product for my liking, but it does blend really well. I prefer to apply and blend it with my fingers and that way I have a nice subtle color. Definitely interested in purchasing another shade. That heart stamp makes me so happy.

reviews.review_title: Best everyday glowing no makeup look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite Kaja product. All of the colors of these blushes are awesome but this one is so perfect for that fresh healthy no makeup look. It blends beautifully and is so fun and low maintenance. It also has this light frangrence that I'm now addicted to! It's my everyday blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are SO MUCH FUN. The applicator is the cutest thing I have ever seen and so fun to use! You can leave cute little hearts stamped on your face, or you can use your fingers to gently blend them out into the most beautiful rosy cheek color. And a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this for the first time today. I absolutely love it! This will be my new blush from here on out! Thanks, Sephora and Kaja!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing!  The stamp applies just the right amount of product, and it blends like a dream.  Not cakey, streaky, or chalky.  I am coming back for a second color.  Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin that just works better with cream products, so I am always on the lookout for cream blushes. I was SO excited for this product!! The formula blends like a dream, and the stamp applicator is actually pretty perfect for applying, but I used my fingers to blend it out. The main drawback, and the reason why I will be returning, is because it is so glittery!!! It‚Äôs gorgeous, and will look great on so many people, but I just can‚Äôt do glitter in my blush personally. It‚Äôs an amazing product other than that. But nowhere in the description does it say anything about actual glitter. It‚Äôs not exactly chunky glitter, but it‚Äôs more than just shimmer. I am so, so sad about this! I will definitely try out Kaja‚Äôs other products, though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in shade 3, thinking it would be a nice, sheer coral. The product itself does blend out nicely, giving a natural flush, but the product itself contains gold sparkles. No thanks.

reviews.review_title: Something you could buy at Claire‚Äôs...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my opinion, this product is tacky. The cheek heart stamp and packaging makes it feel like something you could buy at Claire‚Äôs for ten dollars. I don‚Äôt like the fact that it‚Äôs really a product best used with your fingers, because I like to avoid doing my makeup with my fingers. My biggest concern, though, is that there‚Äôs no extra sealant on the inside to protect the product. Usually with cushion foundations they have an extra cover on the inside to prevent the product from drying out, and this has none. I didn‚Äôt keep this product long enough to confirm whether or not it did dry out, but this is very poor storage to me. That said, it was very soft and blendable and you only needed one press to get pigment. Would I recommend? Not for this price, no.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I normally don‚Äôt do cream blushes but I really like the color I saw online and just gave it a go! I blend it in with a beauty blender and it‚Äôs beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Blush TO GO! I find that most blushes look too tacky on me. It was the perfect color to added or to my face. Very natural. The design is also very cute. Also, it is so satrifying to stamp it on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love! It‚Äôs so natural and blendable it‚Äôs completely taking over for my powder blush. Especially nice because I prefer a dewy finish. My niece also loves it and insists I give her heart cheeks, she‚Äôs two but she has great taste ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product and this particular shade! The color compliments my skin tone and ginger hair perfectly, and I love how blendable and buildable the cream is. The flush looked so natural on my cheeks! I‚Äôm not the biggest fan of the stamp itself because I‚Äôm very minimalistic with regards to how I do my makeup, but I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs right up someone‚Äôs alley, and it certainly doesn‚Äôt detract from the product in the least to have the option.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and beautiful to wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I almost never get to wear blush because I have very sensitive skin with chronic light redness, so any blush I add tends to make me look ill. Both powders and creams are too much and too difficult to control in terms of placement and sheering out. But the Coy color - and yes, the heart-shaped applicator - intrigued me. This product does not disappoint. The applicator is almost extra; for me, the power is in the product itself. It blends seamlessly into my skin and blends out nicely with my fingers, giving me the healthy flush I‚Äôve always wanted. I hate to say it, but I already look forward to applying my makeup tomorrow because it‚Äôs such fun to finally get to use a product that has alluded me for so long. It looks natural and beautiful and I love it! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush. The heart shaped applicator is cute but a bit unnecessary. I put a bit on and then blend with my fingers. I don‚Äôt use foundation with it so far, cause I like that it gives a really natural looking flush.

reviews.review_title: cool packaging easy to use gives you a real flush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Cute packaging pigmentation is great it gives you the effortless application want to try the other colors easy to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For starters, I'm not much of a blush person, but I LOVE these. They packaging is great and I love the fun, springy applicator. I love experimenting between stamped hearts or blending it out for a nice subtle look. The product is buildable and smooth and the colors are fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never really been a fan of cream blushes because I often feel like one application is WAY TOO MUCH, and then most of my time is spent blending it out. This stuff is sheer enough that you can really build and use as little or as much as you want. In love with this coral-y shade - it looks so beautiful with golden highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really great product. Very interesting idea behind it. The product is buildable so you can be as extra as you want and leave it as the hearts or you can blend it out with your fingers. I made the mistake of applying it over a set and powdered face out of habit and it didn‚Äôt work out so well but once I tried it before setting my face it was great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve always stayed away from cream blush because I tend to use too much, the heart stamp is not only cute but portions out the exact amount needed for your cheek so you don‚Äôt use too much product. Super blendable and comes in really nice shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this for the first time today and I love it! The packaging is so fun and I love how I am build the color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This concept is so awesome! I love this blush because after stamping I can blend with my finger! All four shades are stunning!  I have pretty tan skin and love blushes for that extra pop!  Buy this product, you will LOVE it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These cushion blushes are fantastic! The colors are all lovely; they give a natural finish, they are buildable, and they blend seamlessly into the skin. The applicator is not only cute, but it also does the job really well! I‚Äôm really impressed with these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: soft, lightweight, blendable, but still pack a (natural) punch. the effortless flush these give is so so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Get you heart ready for heart failure! A heart shaped stamp that has this oddly satisfying click noise when you push it into the cushion and onto your cheek - this is genius. COY is my favorite because it gives you that youthful yet subtle color that makes you look so fresh. I love how I can stamp this 2-3x to make it stand out more. I have warmer, tan skin, so it's the perfect color to build on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have always enjoyed cream/liquid blushes but find I have difficulty with application more often than not. This product completely fixes that! It deposits exactly the right amount of product for a beautiful flush and blends out beautifully! The heart stamp is also incredibly cute and makes it even more fun to use. I generally like a lot of blush so I love that I can add as much as I like to get to the intensity I prefer. This is also a fun product to use under a sheer foundation powder if you‚Äôd like a softer more natural flush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Aside from the fact that this is cutest blush I have ever seen, it‚Äôs also a fantastic color! It is a liquid blush that easily blends without feeling heavy. The color is rich in pigment and gave my cheeks a full, healthy look. And honestly, it‚Äôs so fun to put little hearts on my cheeks and have a cheery laugh while doing my makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Supper cute application! Very easy to blend. I love it!  @chistianglamlopez

reviews.review_title: No more brushes or beauty sponges!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is by far one of the most innovative and creative products I‚Äôve ever worked with! I admire how quickly it is to use! This product is travel friendly! Very lightweight and easy to get that tint of Blush! You can honestly use your fingers to blend the product! I also love that you can build up the Blush! No more being afraid of Blush!  Pros: The formula is perfect! I love that  this product is universal for all skin tones! I‚Äôve been playing around with them! I appreciate how it dries down nicely and doesn‚Äôt ‚Äòmake any patches! I tried it as Blush, a quick lip tint, and a little tint for the eyes!   Cons: I wish the heart applicator was made of plastic rather than a traditional foam. Plastic would be best since it can be cleaned easily and be more sanitary friendly.  I highly recommend this Blush! This is definitely great for simple to full glam looks!

reviews.review_title: Not just a cute product, blends like a dream!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been a fan of cream or liquid blushes as I have some texture on my cheeks and I find that even the lightest of products sinks into my pores or pulls up my foundation. But with Cheeky Stamp i find the formula quickly transforms to a smooth powder texture and is a light enough color that i dont have to blend too hard to disperse the product. it's my go to product to perk up the face during the day, i stamp a heart on each cheek overtop my existing makeup and then blend in with my fingertips. I have both Coy and Saucy and love them for a medium neutral skin tone.
